wikipedia_page.main: Horace Elliott Bowden (5 November 1880 – 23 August 1958) was an Australian politician who represented the South Australian House of Assembly seat of Gouger from 1943 to 1944 for the Labor Party.

link_mentions.page: Members of the South Australian House of Assembly, 1941–1944
response: : Gouger independent MHA Albert Robinson died on 25 May 1943. Labor candidate Horace Bowden won the resulting by-election on 10 July.
